```{r}
gsw <- read.csv('C:/Users/CK/Documents/stat133/hw-stat133/workout01/data/shots-data.csv')

two_pt_shooting <- arrange(summarise(group_by(gsw, name), total = sum(shot_type == "2PT Field Goal"), made = sum(shot_type == "2PT Field Goal" & shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), perc_made = made/total), desc(perc_made))


three_pt_shooting <- arrange(summarise(group_by(gsw, name), total = sum(shot_type == "3PT Field Goal"), made = sum(shot_type == "3PT Field Goal" & shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), perc_made = made/total), desc(perc_made))

total_shooting <- arrange(summarise(group_by(gsw, name), total = sum(shot_type == "2PT Field Goal" | shot_type == "3PT Field Goal"), made = sum( shot_made_flag == "shot_yes"), perc_made = made/total), desc(perc_made))
```
